people_also_ask.heading: McMillen also discussed how Super Mario Bros. was a huge inspiration for Super Meat Boy. "I think mechanically, it all comes from Mario. There's a reason why it's called Super Meat Boy," he said, noting SMB is the abbreviation for both Super Meat Boy and Super Mario Bros.16-Jan-2019

knowledge_panel.description: super meat boy is a 2010 platform game designed by edmund mcmillen and tommy refenes under the collective name of "team meat". it was self-published as the successor to meat boy, a 2008 flash game designed by mcmillen and jonathan mcentee. wikipedia
